mapper.sql: id, fid, authority_name, authority_path, is_del, create_time, last_modify_time
mapper.insert: insert into t_authority (id, fid, authority_name, authority_path, is_del, create_time, last_modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authorityPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into t_authority
id,
fid,
authority_name,
authority_path,
is_del,
create_time,
last_modify_time,

mapper.update:
update t_authority
fid = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
authority_name = #{authorityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
authority_path = #{authorityPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_authority set fid = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, authority_name = #{authorityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, authority_path = #{authorityPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_authority
authority_name = #{authorityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update t_authority set is_del = 1 where menu_fid = #{fid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
